type: Request for Proposal - Request for Quotation
short_summary: Provide Research Papers as specified in the Statement of Work.
full_summary:
### Research Paper - Indigenous
#### Government Tender Announcement
#### Reference Number: cb-98-11759611

* **Publication Date:** October 23, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 6, 2023, at 2:00:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 13, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 15, 2024

#### Details
This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of research papers on indigenous topics. The Canadian Defence Academy is seeking expert analyses in the form of Research Papers to inform the Canadian Armed Force's operational requirements to address complex peace and security issues.

#### Eligibility Criteria
The selection of the contractor will be based on the highest technical merit within a stipulated maximum budget. 

#### Tender Requirements
* To fulfill the mandatory requirements of the contract, the contractor must submit a Research Paper.
* The Research Paper must meet the specified requirements outlined in the statement of work.
* The contractor must demonstrate expertise in the subject matter.

#### Submission Instructions
* Proposals must be submitted electronically through the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell website.
* Proposals must be received by the closing date and time listed above.

#### Contact Information
For more information or clarification on the tender, please contact:
J4 CDA Procurement
Email: [J4Log-LogJ4@forces.gc.ca](mailto:J4Log-LogJ4@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: (613) 293-2512

#### Attachments
The following documents can be downloaded from the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell website:
* [Tender Notice](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22819/w4938-23-101s-rfp-indigenous-english_0.pdf)
* [Questions and Answers](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22819/w4938-23-101s-questions-and-answers-1%28eng-french.pdf)

#### Note
This tender opportunity has expired. Please note that the tender closing date has passed, and proposals are no longer being accepted. 

Note: I used markdown format as requested. Please let me know if any amendments or further work is required.  Let me know how to correct anything if not right.

**end of response**
